text: â€˜â€˜Enkalitam oru tutar varuvarayin niccayamaka nankal marra ella vakupparaiyum vita nerana pataiyil cenru vituvom'' enru (inta arapikal) allahvin mitu mika urutiyana cattiyam ceytu kurinarkal. Eninum, ivarkalitam (nam) tutar vanta camayattil atu veruppait tavira (veretanaiyum) ivarkalukku atikappatuttavillai
